div.div: A random PBKDF2 key gets generated

div.div: User content gets encrypted using AES and the PBKDF2 key

div.div: The previous AES encrypted content, gets encrypted using RABBIT with the custom password the user input

div.div: The required info gets send to the backend
(the encrypted content, the iv used, whether or not its set to be viewed once, has a custom pass and is marked as code)

switch.text: The required info gets send to...
